Note: Signed "James Montgomery Flagg." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation:  Vertical.
Description: Text says to enlist and become a U. S. Marine. Illustration shows a U.S. Marine standing in front of the American flag.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
